website_summaries.verdict: Perfect for those who want to want to use cable band machines at the gym and do traditional leg band exercises at home.
pros: Traditional medium resistance leg resistance band comes with ankle straps that you can attach to health club cable machines (the ones that usually go missing at the gym, or are icky from the previous user)
Padding around ankle straps ensures comfort
cons: You only get one band with the straps

customer_reviews.title: Poor design, unless you have huge ankles
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed in these, especially given the cost. While the material is heavy duty the design is very flawed. The bands only get as small as the width of the band, and there is not a big enough lip underneath the metal clip, so in my case in order for me to make this fit around my ankle, I needed to force pull the Velcro through which meant it was not flat, or leave it loose. In either case there is not enough cushion between the metal clip and my skin making these very uncomfortable. Hope I can get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: Great for cable workouts.
customer_reviews.text: After scouring through Amazon for the best ankle straps, I decided on these and they did not disappoint. I like that they come with a small bag and also have a resistance band. There was also a card in there for a site to go to for workouts. I have only used them twice so far and they are holding up just fine. I will say that you have to make sure they are tight (no looseness at all around the ankle) when you put them on otherwise when you use them it feels weird. Definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Pezzella

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations!! Arrived earlier then expected! Product fits well and is high quality!! I love the travel bag, two ankle straps, and extra resistance band included! Works awesome to target glute and hamstring exercises!! I love Evoness!
customer_reviews.author: jamielv

customer_reviews.title: 2 at the same damn time 😂
customer_reviews.text: So Comfy!!!! Love it! I don’t have to go through the trouble of changing the straps anymore yay! They’re so cute too!
customer_reviews.author: Convcorta

customer_reviews.title: Not for high weight
customer_reviews.text: They’re comfortable enough but can’t handle a lot of weight. I got to 25 pounds and the D Rings started rotating and digging into my ankle.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Grey

customer_reviews.title: C-
customer_reviews.text: I love these so much... my only issue is that if you go above 70 pounds on the cables the rings start to painfully dig into your shin...... yikes... have to fold up the band and shove it in the front of the strap to prevent it from bruising me
customer_reviews.author: Brynn

customer_reviews.title: They appear to be very sturdy. The metal part didn’t hurt me at all ...
customer_reviews.text: So far these straps are exceeding my expectations! They appear to be very sturdy. The metal part didn’t hurt me at all and I was able to lift almost double the weight I did with the cheap straps the gym offers. I see people complaining about the band that comes with the straps but, personally, I didn’t purchase these for the band. Highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Yajaira S.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with these
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these. I tried many in the past, they do slip when I cable pull at the gym and the metal part-hook rubs at the ankle bone, but not these. They are sturdy, stay put and are well cushioned Highly recommended. If you need a good pair of cable pulling for a toned bottom, look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Maya

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and good quality - what more could you ask for?
customer_reviews.text: These ankle straps are wonderful for an off and on gym goer like me! I have used them a few times and they are comfortable (padded) and fit great. They also look good - not going to lie, I've seen some gross looking straps and these are anything but. They come in a nice bag so you can carry them and not worry about losing one. Oh, and a resistance band is also included - you can use this at home if you can't make it to the gym! I would recommend these ankle straps to anyone looking for comfortable and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: YoMama67

customer_reviews.title: Worth Your Money
customer_reviews.text: I just got these ankle straps. I can't compare them to any other product since this is the first time I purchase ankle straps. They are comfy and easy to use. They have like a foam inner coating which makes them comfortable and stable when using. The band that comes with the purchase isn't anything special. The resistance on the band is not great and the "bonus video" is just some 2 min YouTube video that you could have just looked up online for exercises. As for durability; we'll just have to see how long this product will last. I will put them to good use; and so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Genesis

customer_reviews.title: Durable and doesn’t hold sweat.
customer_reviews.text: I’m really glad I got these. Planet fitness didn’t have any at the gym close to my house and the other gyms had very worn out ones which others probably sweated in and were never cleaned. These hold up very well. Been leg lifting about 40lbs each leg and they work great. The band it comes with is not very tight. It’s probably a beginner band but can be useful to add an extra 2lbs to your load.
customer_reviews.author: Celi

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I have really skinny ankles and the straps at the gym do not fit properly or end up scratching up my ankles with the amount of strap leftover and these have completely fixed that problem! They are extremely comfortable and have endured many sweaty workouts and are still going strong! I love these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have in your gym bag!
customer_reviews.text: These are super comfortable and great quality. I can’t gym without them! The resistance band was an added benefit to this purchase. Although I do wish it was a bit tighter, but that may be cause I’m a smaller framed person? Anyways, the bag they come in is also a great touch! Definitely a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Great addition!
customer_reviews.text: My apartment gym doesn't have ankle straps so I had to purchase these and absolutely love them. They add so many exercises to my list that I wouldn't have been able to before and are holding up great! I love the little bag they come in so that I can keep all my attachments separate. I would suggest these to anyone looking to step their game up when it comes to the cable machine. They're great for leg and glute day!
customer_reviews.author: Clay

customer_reviews.title: Great ankle straps
customer_reviews.text: Almost didnt buy these because of reviews saying it cuts into their ankles, but im glad i did. These fit well and i have had no issues with the ring digging into my ankles at all. I also have skinny ankles and they fit just fine. The booty band really isnt that great tension wise and it rolls while exercising.
customer_reviews.author: J03K3R

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, Comfortable, Secure Fit.
customer_reviews.text: Love these ankle straps!! I've had mine for several months now and they work great! The fit is very comfortable and secure. The rings are made of metal instead of plastic, like some of the other brands, which makes them very sturdy. I've done hip extensions using weights of forty and fifty pounds with no problem. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Reading Fanatic

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Durable!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because my girlfriends gym didn't have any to use. Overall product has good straps, comfortable padding, point of contact where you put the cable is at a not awkward spot like some other products and seems sturdy with pretty high weights. I know use this at my own gym over the ones my gym provides!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Don’t get this for the resistance band!
customer_reviews.text: I love the ankle straps and the cute bag but the pink resistance band has zero resistance. So that was slightly upsetting. Overall, the main reason I got this was for the ankle straps so I can’t be too mad!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Pike

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Price!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about the quality of these for the price, but they exceeded all my expectations, they're very well made, and work great in the gym, I'm just glad I no longer have to use the one at the gym with everyone else's sweat all over it! Great product, great price!
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Coryell

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my gym bag and great value.
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They work great and are easy to get on and get off. They stay in place while I am working out and they are holding up well. My ankles are a bit small so I have to secure them all the way but they hold in place thanks to the material that is inside the cuff.
customer_reviews.author: Brighter Side of Life

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty tough
customer_reviews.text: These are incredible. I've used them in the gym for different types of cable workouts multiple times. I gave them a 4 out of 5 on durability simple because they are made of velcro and over time all velcro slips up. So far these are great.
customer_reviews.author: LTB

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: GF uses these at the gym. They do what they should. Not sure what else to say about something like this. She's had them for about 3 months and they do what she needs. She doesn't complain that they're uncomfortable or anything like that so I guess they're pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: azhelton

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and well made for the price
customer_reviews.text: They are durable and have good quality for the price. They are also comfortable. I've used them just 4 times so far and they've held up to a good amount of weight pulling. I hope they continue to last a very long time. Most importantly I don't have to wait for straps at the gym to become available, now I just bring mine!
customer_reviews.author: Mmagirl

customer_reviews.title: just as promised
customer_reviews.text: Working out with exercise bands at home now, due gym closed for corona crises, and the ankle straps that came with the band set I bought we terrible, cheap, not padded etc. I bought these based on reviews and they were just as others said, well made, comfortable, and well padded. Made doing leg exercises with the bands a hundred times more comfortable !!
customer_reviews.author: helpful husband

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: These straps make the cable machine so much more usable. I can do several different workouts with both my arms and legs to target my full body! Love these. They even extend to fit my large calves when I want to target certain parts of my glutes. It's also great having two so I dont have to switch back and forth which makes for faster more effective workouts. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Ebony

customer_reviews.title: So easy to put on and take off
customer_reviews.text: I really like these ankle straps. They are very comfortable and easy to put on and take off. I also was looking for straps that had only one D ring. It makes it so much faster for attaching to the resistance bands. I highly recommend these. It is also very nice that they come with a nice carrying bag and a resistance band. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and food quality
customer_reviews.text: I really like the straps! I have tiny ankles and they still fit really nicely with comfortable lining. They also come with a nice little pouch to keep them in. They feel sturdy when using them. The elastic band that comes with it virtually serves no purpose, as it's super thin with nearly no resistance - so it's good they don't advertise the band.
customer_reviews.author: Love Bug

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I have not used it for too long but so far they are great for what I am using. Padding is nice as well. I plan to use it regularly so I will see how the quality is. So far it looks pretty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Cerine

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. I like the cushy material that keeps the velcro from rubbing on my skin. Haven't tried the band yet, but the ankle straps seem to be solidly made and worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: Laura D.

customer_reviews.title: Great exercise equipment.
customer_reviews.text: These ankle straps are high quality and durable with a nice color scheme. They work well with the included resistance bandx but you can use other bands and even attach weights for certain workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Great until they were stolen!
customer_reviews.text: These ankle straps worked really well! Unfortunately they worked so well that someone at the gym decided they needed them instead of me :(. If you buy these, make sure you have eyes on them so they don't walk off!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: can't get any easier than this
customer_reviews.text: excellent when performing 4 way hip strengthening exercises using the cable. Does not rub or pinch and a good replacement for the not so comfortable straps the gym supplies
customer_reviews.author: tracey- lynn

customer_reviews.title: Super soft, very comfortable, just the right width
customer_reviews.text: The EVONESS ankle straps are well padded and very secure. They are about 2 3/4 inches wide - which is nice. This is an excellent product. They also comes in a cute, convenient drawstring carrying bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Tyson

customer_reviews.title: I love the ankle straps
customer_reviews.text: I love the ankle straps!! They are super comfy and work great for my leg workouts with the cable machine. Don't really like the band, it doesn't stay put. I move and it rolls down.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Wrong delivery issue turned into favorite workout accessory
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I was very annoyed by the fact that I first received an empty package but the seller contacted me and on top of giving me a refund they re-send the straps. Just used them yesterday and they are very good quality sooo much better than really hard on your ankles basic gym straps, they definitely made my workout better and the compression band is not too loose but not too tight either, perfect to add that little extra something to your workout (squats, hip thrust, kickbacks, etc).
customer_reviews.author: Maddy

customer_reviews.title: Love them! Price is extremely cheap for the quality!! Love love 200%
customer_reviews.text: Love them!! They are very nice and feel extremely expensive for the price that I paid! They seem like the would cost more , but nope. Good price and excellent straps! Recommend 100%
customer_reviews.author: brenda

customer_reviews.title: It fits well, I like them
customer_reviews.text: I bought those because the gym ankle straps are to big or missing all the time, now I have my own set and is easy to carrier them, those ankle straps fit perfect, I have used them twice. No issue for now.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: A bit uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I used these twice so far and I wish the inside of the strap had a softer fabric. The product rubs the skin on my ankle which makes it uncomfortable. I also think it should be a bit wider for the ankle. But these will do for the time being.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Good padding can handle heavy weights
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product for about 2 weeks now and I’m honestly satisfied. Even with “heavy” (depending on what your heavy is) weights my ankles or wrists aren’t in pain AKA pretty good padding. The only thing is that I’ve only had it for a short time so if you see Anthony review from me is more than likely about longevity, wear and tear especially since it’s constantly rubbing on socks cause I don’t always wear ankle or no shoes socks.
customer_reviews.author: krissie

customer_reviews.title: They are good
customer_reviews.text: They feel good and comfortable. I train with decent weight and they hold strong. Only thing is I have tiny ankles so they are almost too big for me.
customer_reviews.author: Cecee

customer_reviews.title: Great straps not so great band
customer_reviews.text: These ankle straps are awesome, especially for the price. They work really well. The band is not the best because it bunches up, but is still usable. Def products worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Martyna

customer_reviews.title: If I need another one I would definitely get these.
customer_reviews.text: I love my ankle strap. it really helps me with my cable kickbacks. Great for glute workouts. Share it with another female at the gym she was like these are great. Prevents you from hurting your ankles. It came nicely packaged too.
customer_reviews.author: Lobster

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: So far after one use I am very glad I bought these ankle straps! They are completely comfortable and attach easily and securely to the cable apparatus. So much better than pushing my foot through the handle of regular cable machines meant for upper body.
customer_reviews.author: Ggmk

customer_reviews.title: So much better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like the ankle straps at the gym, so I decided to get my own. These were reasonably priced and I figured it was worth the risk of them not being fantastic. Well, I was in for a great surprise when I tried them on. They are very well cushioned and durable. Far better than what is available at the gym and I feel better about having my own.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product in used but it was in brand new condition. The pink band was not as resistant as I would like but it was a nice bonus. The ankle straps are very comfortable and it was just what I was looking for to help me kick up my workout.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen P.

customer_reviews.title: product quality
customer_reviews.text: LOVE my new ankle straps!!!!! Perfect for the gym! Now I do not have to worry about looking for them at the gym. Very sturdy too!!!! Great fit and I have a very skinny ankle
customer_reviews.author: Denise McPhillips

customer_reviews.title: Good accessory for your workout
customer_reviews.text: Nice addition for leg involved workouts on cable machine, really nice having your own and not having to share the sweat with random people at the gym.
customer_reviews.author: B. Rozas

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I loveeeee these ankle straps! It is so convenient to have these on for the gym and to use for the cable machine. I love how it is mainly black with pink words it makes it look cute. These are very sturdy and can hold up to large weights. If you’re thinking about purchasing please do. I’ve had these for about 3 months and I can’t go to the gym without it. It even comes with a free pink resistance band!
customer_reviews.author: Shante

customer_reviews.title: Great for the gym!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because every time I went to my gym, someone was either using the ankle straps or they were no where to be found so I couldn't complete the workouts I wanted to. They came very quickly and I love how they included a resistance band. I wear they while I'm working out and forget that I have them on sometimes. They are light weight and convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen C

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my gym workouts and they work great. Really easy to get on and off, and very comfortable. The added band was a nice bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Two Dogs

customer_reviews.title: Yes !
customer_reviews.text: I love using them. We don’t have anything like that at the gym to work butt muscles... they are super confortable and great quality. Plus, there is a mini bag to carry them and that’s super practical !!
customer_reviews.author: AnaG

customer_reviews.title: Band sucks
customer_reviews.text: I love the ankle straps. They are comfy and sturdy but the resistance band is cheap and rolls easily. I couldn't even make use of it. It was worth the price because the ankle straps are well loved by me.
customer_reviews.author: Mai Sai Lee

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Comfortable. Easy to use. It has been very convenient to have two of my own ankle straps, this way I don't have to switch them back and forth from one ankle to another between exercises. Highly recommend this product :)
customer_reviews.author: megz

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great product
customer_reviews.text: I’ll update as to durability if they end up falling apart, but I am very pleased thus far. They are comfortable, they are definitely affordable, and they work for what i need them for. I could take or leave the resistance band, but that’s not why i bought these.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and easy
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best ankle cuffs, that I always get asked about when I workout with my girlfriends. I work hard at the gym and these have been, not only a comfortable fit, but have lasted for over 6 months.

customer_reviews.title: They fit nicely in the drawstring bag they came in
customer_reviews.text: These work exactly how I need for leg & booty exercises. They fit nicely in the drawstring bag they came in. I no longer have to hunt down the straps my gym sometimes has :p. I love having the bonus resistance band for hip thrusts. Great product all around.
customer_reviews.author: casey

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: Love the ankle straps and bag. The band is nice however it rolls so that was been a bit disappointing.but I have others so I can work with it.😉
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These ankle straps are great, have enough padding and don’t slip.
customer_reviews.author: zanny<3

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and great piece of equipment to add new exercises to routine especially if your gym doesn't have them
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie G.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely, buy.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. I’ve had them for about 6 months and they are holding up well. Fits my petite ankle well. 100% satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and durable
customer_reviews.text: They’re comfortable and durable but I don’t like the strap going through the loop. I wish it doubled back on itself to Velcro instead
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hatfield

customer_reviews.title: everything
customer_reviews.text: when I opened my package everything was in there and nothing was damaged. I received both ankle attachments and a resistance band, everything works perfectly
customer_reviews.author: n

customer_reviews.title: Easy and cute
customer_reviews.text: Nicely padded, easy to use and cute! The bag it comes in is handy and so is the band.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie Carlotto Yokoda Stobbe

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. So pleased with two ankle straps. This helped with the speed of working out and not having to switch on the ankle so many times. The carrying bag is helpful to!
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Nice item to have
customer_reviews.text: A must have if your going to the gym. Was so nice to have these, and not have to worry about sharing dirty old ones at the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Harvey

customer_reviews.title: I really like these ankle straps.
customer_reviews.text: They are lightweight, nice color, and easy to use. I love that they came with a bag to to carry them in and a resistance band.
customer_reviews.author: Ronda

customer_reviews.title: Great for leg day at the gym
customer_reviews.text: I was missing those ankle straps in my gym, so I decided to give a try to this brand. Great price, product, easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Rnana

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Came earlier than expected, was in a cute little bag with everything in it. Put them on just to try them and they felt comfortable and well made! Can not wait to give them a try at the gym!!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Very steady
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for a month and am very enthusiastic with the results....
customer_reviews.author: Maria de Fatima Balbino

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, comfortable and sturdy ankle strap
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, extremely well made and SUPER comfortable because of the padding. I wore it for my entire leg workout and had zero problems. I love that it only has one D ring. Velcro is extremely strong and should last years. Awesome value as you get two straps.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Tagaloni

customer_reviews.title: Straps are good
customer_reviews.text: The straps are great. The band is a scam; that thing will stretch all the way to China (there is no resistance) so go for just the straps in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with them
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with my purchase. The material is strong and sturdy. At first I had a problem retrieving the link to the video but they replied immediately and shared the link. I highly recommend them. I am using them every week at the gym
customer_reviews.author: Paula J

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: I like the straps. They are very durable and comfortable. I use them when I train, specifically glute weight training. They are great!
customer_reviews.author: tasha hayes

customer_reviews.title: Great for on the go!
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of never being able to find the right ankle straps at the gym for glute workouts so I decided to purchase my own. Comes with a cute carrying case. My only complaint is that I wish there was more pink in the design or stitching. The only thing pink is the logo on the label which is sew on. Seems like a bit of an after thought.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Dang

customer_reviews.title: Comfiest kick back braces ever!
customer_reviews.text: These are so perfect for cable exercises. Very comfortable padding. Definitely recommend to anyone who’s looking to buy ankle straps!
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Well made product
customer_reviews.text: Well made product. Is can see this lasting for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Good quality. Does what it's designed to do. No issues at all. Also doesn't cut into your ankle like some of these do, which means I'll actually use it.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla McFly

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this a while ago and it's still in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits my cankles!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a few different brands of these since I knew i'd have trouble with my chubby ankles, and this one is perfect! Would fit a much smaller or bigger ankle. Once strapped in, these don't move around on my ankle at ALL. Also great that the package comes with 2, so you don't have to keep taking it off and on to alternate legs. Also the foam padding is comfortable, I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Must have for leg and booty cable work!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for leg and booty work at the gym. My gym doesn’t have these but even if they did I really like having my own. Ya never know what kinda funk is stuck in that velcro on the straps at the gym.
customer_reviews.author: cassy

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Got this so I wouldn't have to use the communal gym strap. This works fantastic Its very comfortable and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Sierraroses

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: I used mine at the gym yesterday for some cable kick backs. And I was impressed! They are super comfy and handle weight very well. I would highly recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Thick straps
customer_reviews.text: Nice and padded. Makes my ankles sweat but only use for few minutes each workout and only couple times a week
customer_reviews.author: Stephen A.

customer_reviews.title: Work great!
customer_reviews.text: These are great - well made. Easy to put on and use. I use pretty heavy weights and these are as comfortable as I would expect.
customer_reviews.author: VP

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, and durable
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. Love the bag that comes with it so I can store without getting dusty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice one!
customer_reviews.text: I finally tried these yesterday at the gym. The straps are comfortable and sturdy. Good quality product. I am happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item and great price
customer_reviews.text: Someone stole mine I ordered some other ones just because I wanted to be cheap and I don’t like. Will be ordering these ones again. I had them for like 6 months before they got stolen and never had a problem with them.
customer_reviews.author: Perla Macias

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, just what I needed for the gym
customer_reviews.author: Schell

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Work great since my gym doesn't have these! Love the drawing small bag them come in as well.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne

customer_reviews.title: Love em!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit to the ankle. Very snug and secure. No snag on skin or uncomfortable pulling. Great for hip flexor and glute workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Duel

customer_reviews.title: Great Straps
customer_reviews.text: Tried these straps with my weight machine and they worked perfect. The Velcro stays secure and the padding is very comfortable. Definitely a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: shoptilludrop

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it take it with me to the gym everyday..
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Works Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Not only did the item arrived on time, but works perfect! It’s very comfortable when doing the workout on the cable with the ankle straps. I tried others before this type and Norma the other ones would always hurt while being on the cable but not these ones! I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: I seriously LOVE this product! Came on time and had all of the right materials in it. The resistance band is awesome and the ankle straps work PERFECTLY! Definitely recommend 10/10 if you're looking for a great workout for a great price! AND IT'S PINK!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Lanford

customer_reviews.title: Lifesavers
customer_reviews.text: These are lifesavers at the gym! This is one of the best purchases I’ve made. Completely changed my workouts!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product and have expanded my workouts thanks to these babies
customer_reviews.author: Nubia

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comftroble
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. You can feel the sweatiness after a few reps but makes you feel like you are getting the job done. Easy to put on, take off and attach hooks. And it came with a band.
customer_reviews.author: GMA

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I’m giving this product a 4 is because the resistance band was entirely way too big for me but otherwise the products are all I could have asked for!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great ankle straps!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and easy to put on! I use them every week and I love them!
customer_reviews.author: MEprincess

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Used them today and they were outstanding. No slipping as the velcro held tight. I highly recommend this product...#gymrat...#g
customer_reviews.author: Vanna

product_meta.title: EVONESS Ankle Straps for Cable Machines and Resistance Band Plus Carry Bag– Premium Fitness Ankle Straps Attachment for Weightlifting and Workout with Ankle Cuffs for Legs, Abs and Glute Exercises
product_meta.description:
Who Says Busy Women Can’t Stay in Shape?

 Are you a modern woman who is too busy working, but still wish to get the body of her dreams? We know how it feels to be crunched for time and we are here to help you! Built to safely increase the efficiency of your workout, Evoness Ankle Straps:

 * Allow you to maximize the efficiency of your training
 * Deliver you faster results in terms of body shaping
 * Can be easily adjusted for a snug fit on your ankles
 *  Come with a resistance band, one video tutorial and a carry bag
 * Make perfect gifts for modern women and fitness lovers

Compatibility

Toned glutes and hamstrings can rock every bikini. Built to help you tone them, the Leg Straps are compatible with standard functional trainers, cable machines, and resistance trainers, being perfect for:

 * Cable mountain climbers
 * Cable kickbacks
 * Inner thigh contractions
 * Outer thigh contractions
 * Cable lounges
 * Cable hip abduction etc.

Outstanding Quality

The quality of our products differentiates us from our competitors. Ergonomically designed for superior comfort and stability, Evoness Ankle Straps:

 * Are fully adjustable, fitting most ankle sizes
 * Feature one D-ring for extra comfort and easy use
 * Are a breeze to put on and connect to the machine
 * Don’t come off when lifting heavier weights
 * Feature thick and soft neoprene padding with no irritating hem

THREE Exclusive Bonuses!

When you buy your ankle strap set today, you will also receive:

 * 1x medium latex band for home exercising
 * 1x carry bag for convenient transportation
 * 1x video tutorial to get the most of your ankle straps

What Are You Waiting For? Buy Now and Start Shaping Your Body!
feature_bullets: 🦄 MAXIMIZE YOUR RESULTS–Whether you are an absolute beginner or a fitness lover, these Ankle Straps for cable machines are perfect for you. Featuring one reinforced D-ring, Evoness Ankle Straps attachment is easy to connect to cable machines and helps you tone your glutes in maximum comfort!

💖 SAFETY AND COMFORT–Pushing your body to the limits gets you the best results, if you do it safely. Their strong Velcro, double stitching and thick, soft neoprene padding make Evoness Gym Ankle Strap the safest and most comfortable cuff strap on the market.

💖 TWICE THE EFFICIENCY–Do you like to stop in the middle of your workout to switch the strap between ankles? We believe it is not only disruptive, but time consuming, so we offer you two Ankle Straps for Cable Machines for faster, amazingly efficient workouts!

💖 LIMITED TIME BONUSES–When you buy your Workout Ankle Straps today, you will receive a medium resistance bands, one waterproof carry bag, and a video tutorial that teaches you how to get the most of your weightlifting ankle strap.

💖 SATISFACTION GUARANTEE–Evoness Neoprene Ankle Straps are made to help you increase the efficiency of your workout and get faster results. In the unlikely case that your Padded Ankle Straps are not perfect for you, send them back within 90 days for a full refund!
